en..instructions:
The simplest way to insert into a sorted array is to do a linear search. With this approach, the program starts at the beginning and searches the array for the right place to insert the value.

In this exercise, you will simulate an ordered insert of five values into a sorted array.

  1. Click the 'Next' button until you've reached the correct position in which to insert the value.

  2. Click 'Insert' to insert the value.

  3. Repeat the process until the array is full.
